title: The new Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 promises up to 30% better power efficiency
content:
After several leaks and rumors, Qualcomm has finally unveiled its latest flagship chipset for smartphones — the Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1. As with all ‘Plus’ variants of flagship Qualcomm chipsets launched over the last few years, the new SoC offers minor improvements over the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, including better CPU and GPU performance

The post The new Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 promises up to 30% better power efficiency appeared first on XDA.
description: After months of leaks and rumors, Qualcomm today finally unveiled its latest flagship chipset -- the Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1.
